name: Room Escape - The Lost Key
description:
Welcome to Room Escape - The Lost Key, a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Room Escape - The Lost Key?

Room Escape - The Lost Key is another point and click room escape game. In Room escape 1 game, consider yourself get trapped inside the room and you just try to escape from this room. First you can find out some hidden object. Then note some important clues and solve some interesting puzzles to escape from this room. Provide lot of adventure escape games for you to play for free.

Good luck and have fun!


Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!
